english.segment1: what are you about. say something secret. in an old order hush. trouble and suffering in a lovely rhythm. a homespun clapboard blackstrap thrush
english.segment2: devoted loyal. undertake the toil. beware of what come natural. undertake the spoil. in a fist
english.segment3: it was cruel. and it came all too natural. as a younger child. a headstrong folklore strawrifle crutch. thresh a crop defiles
english.segment4: in a fist full of sand. it came natural in a fist. full of land.
